Willing to move to another town or city

Source: R/gss_vars_529.R
movetown.Rd

movetown

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question If you could improve your work or living conditions, how willing or unwilling would you be toâ€¦ B. Move to another town or city within this state

Values

  • 1 very willing

  • 2 fairly willing

  • 3 neither willing nor unwilling

  • 4 fairly unwilling

  • 5 very unwilling

  • NA(d) can't choose / NA(i) iap / NA(j) I don't have a job / NA(m) dk, na, iap / NA(n) no answer / NA(p) not imputable / NA(r) refused / NA(s) skipped on web / NA(u) uncodeable / NA(x) not available in this release / NA(y) not available in this year / NA(z) see codebook
